name: places/ChIJn3Ye77lYwokRJpzNWZf62-A
formattedAddress: 1670 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1670 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve given them so many chances but this one takes the cake — so the first time a pair of my lululemon leggings went missing in my load of laundry that I sent to wash and fold.

I told them, they blamed me for sending “valuable clothing” and I wrote it off as a bad one off.

The second time I started noticing my socks would come back not cleaned like as if they had been placed in the dryer and not washed prior to. I asked and was told sometimes a piece gets missing etc and then placed with remaining clothes, again was like eh not a huge deal.

The third time and this is it because at this point it would be silly to give them another chance — they sent me back dirty clothes (I quite literally put water and soap on them and spot cleaned  when I got them back and it came away so easily so they didn’t wash it) folded AND a shirt ripped that they didn’t care to even mention they damaged when I did pick up.

I’m so upset because there aren’t closer options but I also can’t keep losing clothes, having them damaged and paying on the higher end for literally dirty clothes folded. I would avoid at all costs. I’ve done the leg work of trying!

originalText.text: Great neighborhood dry cleaner & tailor! Fair prices. Quality service. Staff friendly.

text.text: Great neighborhood dry cleaner & tailor! Fair prices. Quality service. Staff friendly.

originalText.text: 3k views!!! Glad people are seeing this and making the best choice for their hard earned clothing items. Ruined two of my high end pants by over drying cleaning. Black pants turned blue.  One pair has never been washed and was brand new. They denied doing it which is doesn’t make logical sense. The owner told me to go to consumer affairs and basically to go screw myself. Don’t ever bring any clothes here unless you want your items to be destroyed and then have them deny responsibility for it. And they wanted me to pay to fix a  Prada button up shirt they chipped all the buttons on. Low-class, unprofessional and scam artists.

originalText.text: Always delivers as expected and quickly. Never have had a problem.

text.text: Always delivers as expected and quickly. Never have had a problem.

originalText.text: Great service.  Same day wash and fold if you get clothes in by 11 am.  All staff are SOO nice and helpful.  Also nice that you can put a credit card on file for easy pick-ups.  Would recommend to anyone!
